jme3tools.optimize.LodGenerator.TriangleReductionMethod

    jme3tools.optimize  

    • Uses of LodGenerator.TriangleReductionMethod in jme3tools.optimize

      Methods in jme3tools.optimize that return LodGenerator.TriangleReductionMethod 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static LodGenerator.TriangleReductionMethod LodGenerator.TriangleReductionMethod.valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static LodGenerator.TriangleReductionMethod[] LodGenerator.TriangleReductionMethod.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in jme3tools.optimize with parameters of type LodGenerator.TriangleReductionMethod 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void LodGenerator.bakeLods(LodGenerator.TriangleReductionMethod reductionMethod, float... reductionValues)
      Computes the lods and bake them into the mesh
      This method must be fed with the reduction method LodGenerator.TriangleReductionMethod and a list of reduction values.
      for each value a lod will be generated.
      VertexBuffer[] LodGenerator.computeLods(LodGenerator.TriangleReductionMethod reductionMethod, float... reductionValues)
      Computes the lod and return a list of VertexBuffers that can then be used for lod (use Mesg.setLodLevels(VertexBuffer[]))
      This method must be fed with the reduction method LodGenerator.TriangleReductionMethod and a list of reduction values.
      for each value a lod will be generated.
